meanings.sent1: The monospecific ecosystem had only one type of plant.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the monospecific population of birds in the forest.
meanings.sent3: It was quite monospecific in the zoo with just one type of monkey.
meanings.sent4: The monospecific garden bloomed with a single type of flower.
meanings.sent5: The aquarium showcased a monospecific tank filled with only one kind of fish.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a single species.
meanings.sent1: The monospecific behavior of the panda fascinated the researchers.
meanings.sent2: The monospecific markings on the butterfly made it easy to identify.
meanings.sent3: The monospecific exhibit at the museum featured a unique dinosaur skeleton.
meanings.sent4: Her monospecific knowledge of the rare plant impressed her classmates.
meanings.sent5: The monospecific call of the bird echoed through the forest, signaling its presence.
